level.heading: Application.
level.text: Nothing in this chapter shall be construed to limit any of the rights or remedies provided under 42 U.S.C. § 2000e et seq., 29 U.S.C. § 206(d), Chapter 14 of Title 2, or any other provisions of law relating to discrimination on the basis of race, color, religion, sex, or national origin.

level.heading: Legislative History of Law 6-162
level.text: For legislative history of D.C. Law 6-162, see Historical and Statutory Notes following § 32-601.
